list_definition.definition: a person who is or was speaking

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The speaker was interrupted by hecklers in the crowd.

list_definition.definition: (sometimes loudspeaker) the device in a radio, record-player etc which converts the electrical impulses into audible sounds

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our record-player needs a new speaker.
